!!!!!!!    BEWARE    !!!!!!!!

DO NOT INSTALL THIS GAME. It is infected with the Andr/Kong-Fu-L trojan. (I had to do a master reset on my Samsung as a result, major pain in the ass!)

I only found out because I have LBE Privacy installed on my phone, and I had shut off data access to the app. It kept saying "Data connection unavailable", and when I clicked "exit", it said "You must see ad to use this app".
